CCRCC: A subtype of kidney cancer, characterized by the presence of clear, lipid-rich cytoplasm in the tumor cells, a delicate vascular network surrounding these cells, and generally well-defined tumor margins
PRCC: A subtype of kidney cancer, characterized by the presence of papillary structures lined with cells having prominent nucleoli and low-grade, basophilic cytoplasm, often accompanied by a fibrovascular core within the papillae
